email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for laycan 15-20 October. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of $48.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised quote. $48.50 is more in line with our expectations. We’re good to proceed with the MV Ocean Star for laycan 15-20 October. Please send over the charter party for review. Also, can you confirm the laytime details? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that the revised rate works for you. I’ll send over the charter party shortly. Laytime will be 72 hours total, with 24 hours for loading and 48 hours for discharge. Let me know if you need any further details. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laytime arrangement is acceptable. I’ve reviewed the charter party and everything looks in order. Let’s proceed with the fixture. Please confirm the final freight rate and demurrage rate for our records. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirming the final freight rate of $48.50 per metric ton and demurrage rate of $20,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll proceed with the fixture and send you the finalized charter party shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working together. Best, Sarah.
